type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Promise the Future[/i] – When Sigurd, Father of the Future enters, exile the top four cards of your library face down. Reveal any lands exiled this way. Each nonland card exiled this way becomes foretold. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost. You may play land cards exiled this way for as long as they remain exiled.
[i]The Time Has Come[/i] – Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {1} less to cast.
